account_sid.description: The unique identifier for the account associated with this message.

api_version.description: The version of the Twilio API being used to send or receive this message.

body.description: The text body of the message.

date_created.description: The date and time when the message was created.

date_sent.description: The date and time when the message was sent.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the message was last updated.

direction.description: The direction of the message, whether it's incoming or outgoing.

error_code.description: The error code associated with the message, if any.

error_message.description: The error message description if the message failed to send.

from.description: The phone number or sender ID that the message originated from.

messaging_service_sid.description: The unique identifier for the messaging service associated with the message.

price_unit.description: The currency unit used for pricing of the message.

num_media.description: The number of media files (e.g., images, videos) included in the message.

num_segments.description: The number of message segments if the message exceeds 160 characters.

price.description: The cost of sending the message.

sid.description: The unique identifier for this message.

status.description: The status of the message (e.g., sent, delivered, failed).

subresource_uris.description: Contains links to the subresources related to the message.

feedback.description: URI to access feedback related to the message.

media.description: URI to access media files associated with the message.

to.description: The phone number or recipient ID that the message was sent to.

uri.description: The URI for accessing detailed information about this message.
